name: Wreckage
description: Wreckage, bred by TH Seeds, is a sativa-dominant cross between Trainwreck and SAGE that provides an energetic, happy escape from stress, fatigue, and bad moods. Combining flavor profiles from both parents, Wreckage takes on a fresh menthol and herbal sandalwood aroma.Â
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Focused, Energetic, Talkative, Eye Pressure, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Headache
